column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is my favorite special occasion restaurant. I don't eat meat
column2: which may sound weird that I love this steak house
column3: but there's so many non-meat Â delicious dishes on the menu to try. Wedge salad! Shrimp cocktail! Seafood tower! Crab avacado! And the bread... Oh the bread! Little known fact
column4: despite the fact that there is a a full bar
column5: you may bring in one bottle of wine per group. The wait person will open the bittke for you
column7: but will give away one glass of your wine to another table. Great little perk!
